verses.verse: On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> It Behoves <S%G1163><s%> More Abundantly <S%G4056><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To Give Heed <S%G4337><s%> To The Things <S%G3588><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> Lest At Any Time <S%G3379><s%> We Should Slip Away. <S%G3901><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> For If <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Angels <S%G32><s%> Spoken <S%G2980><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Was <S%G1096><s%> Confirmed, <S%G949><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Transgression <S%G3847><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Disobedience <S%G3876><s%> Received <S%G2983><s%> Just <S%G1738><s%> Recompense, <S%G3405><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Shall Escape <S%G1628><s%> So Great If We <S%G5082><s%> Have Neglected <S%G272><s%> A Salvation? <S%G4991><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> A Commencement <S%G746><s%> Having Received <S%G2983><s%> To Be Spoken Of <S%G2980><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Those That <S%G3588><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Was Confirmed; <S%G950><s%>

Hearing Witness With Them <S%G4901><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> By Signs <S%G4592><s%> Both <S%G5037><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wonders <S%G5059><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Various <S%G4164><s%> Acts Of Power, <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Distributions, <S%G3311><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Will. <S%G2308><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> To Angels <S%G32><s%> Did He Subject <S%G5293><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Habitable World <S%G3625><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is To Come <S%G3195><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> We Speak; <S%G2980><s%>

<S%G1263><s%> But Fully Testified <S%G1161><s%> Somewhere <S%G4225><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> , Saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou Art Mindful <S%G3403><s%> Of Him, <S%G846><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of Man, <S%G444><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thou Visitest <S%G1980><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

Thou Dist Make Lower <S%G1642><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Little <S%G1024><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> ' Than The <S%G3844><s%> Angels; <S%G32><s%> With Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Honour <S%G5092><s%> Thou Dist Crown <S%G4737><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Didst Set <S%G2525><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Of Thy Hands; <S%G4675><s%>

All Things <S%G3956><s%> Thou Didst Subject <S%G5293><s%> Under <S%G5270><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4228><s%> His Feet <S%G846><s%> <S%G1722><s%> For In <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Subjecting <S%G5293><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> He Left <S%G863><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Unsubject. <S%G506><s%> <S%G3568><s%> But Now <S%G1161><s%> Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> Do We See <S%G3708><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Subjected; <S%G5293><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But Who <S%G1161><s%> Little <S%G1024><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> ' Than <S%G3844><s%> The Angels <S%G32><s%> Made Lower <S%G1642><s%> We See <S%G991><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Suffering <S%G3804><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> With Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> With Honour <S%G5092><s%> Crowned; <S%G4737><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> By The Grace <S%G5485><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Every One <S%G3956><s%> He Might Taste <S%G1089><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%>

<S%G4241><s%> For It Was Becoming <S%G1063><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> ' For <S%G1223><s%> Whom Are <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Whom Are <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> Bringing, <S%G71><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leader <S%G747><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4991><s%> Of Their Salvation <S%G846><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Sufferings <S%G3804><s%> To Make Perfect. <S%G5048><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G5037><s%> For Both He Who <S%G1063><s%> Sanctifies <S%G37><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Sanctified <S%G37><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Are All; <S%G3956><s%> ' For <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Cause <S%G156><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not Ashamed <S%G1870><s%> Brethern <S%G80><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To Call, <S%G2564><s%>

Saying <S%G3004><s%> I Will Declare <S%G518><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Thy Name <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> To My Brethern; <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Midst <S%G3319><s%> Of The Assembly <S%G1577><s%> <S%G5214><s%> I Will Sing Praise To Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Will Be 2071 V-FXI-1S Trusting 3982 V-2RAP-NSM ' In 1909 PREP Him. 846 P-DSM And 2532 CONJ Again, 3825 ADV, Behold 2400 V-2AAM-2S I 1473 P-1NS And 2532 CONJ The 3588 T-NPN Children 3813 N-NPN Which 3739 R-APN Me 3427 P-1DS Gave 1325 V-AAI-3S 3588 T-NSM God. 2316 N-NSM

Since <S%G1893><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G3813><s%> Have Partaken <S%G2841><s%> Of Flesh <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> In Like Manner <S%G3898><s%> Took Part In <S%G3348><s%> <S%G3588><s%> The Same, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> He Might Annul <S%G2673><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Might <S%G2904><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> ' <S%G5124><s%> The <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Devil; <S%G1228><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Might Set Free <S%G525><s%> Those <S%G5128><s%> Whosoever <S%G3745><s%> By Fear <S%G5401><s%> Of Death <S%G2288><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Lifetime <S%G3588><s%> Their <S%G2198><s%> Subject <S%G1777><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> To Bondage. <S%G1397><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Indeed <S%G1222><s%> Of Angels <S%G32><s%> Takes He Hold <S%G1949><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Of The Seed <S%G4690><s%> Of Abraham <S%G11><s%> He Takes Hold. <S%G1949><s%>

Wherefore <S%G3606><s%> It Behoved Him <S%G3784><s%> In <S%G2596><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To His Brethern <S%G80><s%> To Be Made Like, <S%G3666><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> A Merciful <S%G1655><s%> He Might Be <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> High Priest In <S%G749><s%> Things <S%G3588><s%> Relating To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Make Propitiation For <S%G2433><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> For In That <S%G1063><s%> He Has Suffered <S%G3958><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> Having Been Tempted, <S%G3985><s%> He Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Tempted <S%G3985><s%> To Help. <S%G997><s%>
